channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023111172
item.description:
Report X-2023111172

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-17
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found with a wet side during unload. Hazmat was given to QA who took it to the hazmat cage in a red tote. Upon inspection it was found that one bottle was leaking with a loose cap and a bad internal seal. DescribePack: Loose cap and bad seal. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat tote and taken to hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023110792
item.description:
Report X-2023110792

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-06
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was wet and brought to QA for inspection. The package was repacked before it was noticed that the leak was coming from inside the package. DescribePack: The inner package containing the sulfuric acid was wet. The cap came off and the seal is broken. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The sulfuric acid container was separated from the other items in the package and placed in a plastic bin to contain the leak.

item.title: Report X-2023111029
item.description:
Report X-2023111029

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: TAYLOR
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOADER WAS WORKING IN TRAILER AND NOTICED HAZMAT ON ITS SIDE AND HAD A WET SPOT. HE NOTIFIED MANAGEMENT AND PACKAGE WAS THEN MOVED BY DESIGNATED RESPONDER TO PROCESSING AREA.

item.title: Report X-2023110721
item.description:
Report X-2023110721

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: OAK PARK
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Inbound performed DPR on package and left package in a tote in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: 2 out of 2 jugs of ConvoClean Forte had loose caps and leaked. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Package was contained in a tote and placed in the hazmat cage with a note that the DPR was completed.

item.title: Report X-2023110953
item.description:
Report X-2023110953

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-13
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was loaded into the van this morning. Package was discovered leaking. Package was brought back to VSA to be placed in a proper tote and awaited to be processed. DescribePack: Package had a lose cap and was leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a leaker tote.

item.title: Report X-2023120314
item.description:
Report X-2023120314

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-20
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: After the package was picked up, it was discovered to be wet and brought to the station. DescribePack: Contents leaked from the top of the can, however, the can cannot be made to leak any longer. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic bin. The can was also tested and found to no longer be leaking.

item.title: Report X-2023110610
item.description:
Report X-2023110610

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-30
  • City: OAK PARK
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE AT SOME POINT TIPPED OVER WITH LOOSE CAP INSIDE CAUSING A SPILL INSIDE THE BOX, WAS DISCOVERED ON THE IC LINE, LIQUID WAS ABSORBED FROM THE BOX DescribePack: LOOSE CAP SMALL LEAKAGE DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS SET UPRIGHT
